projects.title: Copy Elision in C++

projects.title: Loop Invariant in Quick Sort
projects.description: Bothered by the boundary condition when writing sorting algorithm? The concept of loop invariant is here to help.

experience.title: System Integration Engineer
description: Built a single web page application as a bridge between users and a Theorem Proving kernel component.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed the key module of a platform that provides services for marketing activities in 120+ mobile games with over 600K queries per second (QPS).
Designed and developed an eSports live streaming service whose peak concurrent users (PCU) reached 35K.
Efficiently deployed and maintained services engineered by the team. Dealt with process bottlenecks by providing tools that slash manpower input by 25%.
